description: Returns the details about the LF-Tag expression. The caller must be a data lake admin or must have DESCRIBE permission on the LF-Tag expression resource.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name for the LF-Tag expression.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name for the LF-Tag expression.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description with information about the LF-Tag expression.

nested_items.name: CatalogId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the Data Catalog. By default, the account ID in which the LF-Tag expression is saved.

nested_items.name: Expression
nested_items.description: The body of the LF-Tag expression. It is composed of one or more LF-Tag key-value pairs.

nested_items.name: TagValues
nested_items.description: A list of possible values an attribute can take.
